title: George Osborne – 2022 Comments on Government’s Emergency Statement
author: admin
summary: The comments made by George Osborne, the former Chancellor of the Exchequer, on Twitter on 17 October 2022.
content: Congrats to Jeremy Hunt for taking big bold steps to restore U.K. fiscal credibility – reversing most of mini budget & in effect raising income tax (from the 19p legislated by Johnson gov). Not sensible for PM to hide away – she needs to front this to have any chance of survival.
